english: The manager has had nowhere to turn for help .
chinese: 管理者却无处寻求帮助。

english: He could see the ubiquitous tv cameras .
chinese: 他可以看到那些无处不在的电视摄像机。

english: If evicted, they would have nowhere else to go .
chinese: 如果被驱赶，他们就无处可去。

english: The hare could find no safety , a pack of jackals had it in the wind .
chinese: 野兔无处逃生；一群豺狗在追踪它。
无处造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: In paris they have a way of wiping a man out by saying "he's so good-natured" .
chinese: 在巴黎，“他心地好呀”这样的话，可以把一个人羞得无处容身。

english: We found it was in a place where there could be no landing, there being a great surge on the stony beach .
chinese: 我们发现无处可以登陆，因为石滩磷峋，波涛汹涌。

english: The law-of-nature school taught that the fundamental principles of law were everywhere and at all times the same .
chinese: 古典自然法学派认为法则的基本原理是无处不在、无时不同的。

english: God was everywhere, terrible, the living god; and so high the song said, you couldn't get over him .
chinese: 这个令人敬畏，栩栩如生的上帝，他无处不在。那支歌里说，他是那样的高，你无法超越他。

english: Be it ever so humble ， there is no place like home
chinese: 休嫌家贫寒，天涯无处胜家园。

english: The storage is full , but we ' ve nowhere to go
chinese: 等仓库满了，而我们又无处可去的话

english: Technology has changed the world . it is everywhere
chinese: 科技改变了世界。它无处不在。

english: The original of this picture was nowhere to be found
chinese: 这幅画的原作已无处寻觅。

english: Clay is found almost everywhere in the world
chinese: 黏土几乎在世界的每个角落无处不在。

english: Ldiot . he has nowhere to go but back to the noose
chinese: 白痴,他除了绞架之外无处可去
